</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: 16.5pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;color:#555555;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">vim</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
color:#555555;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的学习曲线相当的大（参看</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;color:#555555;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><a href="http://coolshell.cn/articles/3125.html" target="_blank" title="主流文本编辑器学习曲线"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;color:#2970A6">各种文本编辑器的学习曲线</span></a></span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;color:#555555;mso-font-kerning:0pt">），所以，如果你一开始看到的是一大堆</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;color:#555555;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">VIM</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
color:#555555;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的命令分类，你一定会对这个编辑器失去兴趣的。下面的文章翻译自《</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;color:#555555;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><a href="http://yannesposito.com/Scratch/en/blog/Learn-Vim-Progressively/" target="_blank"><span style="color:#2970A6">Learn Vim Progressively</span></a></span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;color:#555555;mso-font-kerning:0pt">》，我觉得这是给新手最好的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;color:#555555;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">VIM</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
